title: Akali 'R' not working?
body:
I played a game with Akali just then and her ultimate stopped working for me mid-game. I could still type the letter 'R' in chat though so there wasn't anything wrong with my keyboard, and then I double checked my keyboard bindings and it was fine. 

I tested this out again in 'training' mode and her ultimate won't work for me - Then I tested out Ahri in training mode and her ultimate/R works fine?? Anybody else having this issue? 

Lost my game coz of this - feels bad.

replies.body: J/K apparently this is because they recently changed Akali's ultimate to be a targetted ability and I had no clue zzzz
